mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrBnefAplTgt Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ BNEF_SN , APL_TURN , BNEF_TGT_TP_CD , MALL_ID , LANG_CD , DVC_CD , MOBILE_APP_SECT_CD , TGT_MBR_TP_CD , TGT_MBR_ATRB_CD , GRPCO_ID , AFF_COM_ID , CHNNL_RECPTN_AGR_SECT_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_BNEF_APL_TGT WHERE 1 = 1 AND BNEF_SN = #{bnefSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND APL_TURN = #{aplTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
